name: com.daftapplegames.building-tools
description: Components and Editor Tools designed to help configure and optimise buildings in Unity projects

samples.description: Contains simple sample assets used by the various sample scenes.
A sample scene and example settings showing how to use Building Tools in an HDRP project, with 3D Forge building assets. Requires the Sample Assets sample to be installed.
A sample scene and example settings showing how to use Building Tools in a URP project, with 3D Forge building assets. Requires the Sample Assets sample to be installed.
A sample scene and example settings showing how to use Building Tools in a BIRP project, with 3D Forge building assets. Requires the Sample Assets sample to be installed.
